name: CEB_Documentation
observations: 5 Typst PDF documents created for ČEB AML/KYC system in /home/user/apertia/ceb/docs/
03-process-map.pdf - complete process A-Z with 10 minute timeline diagram
04-analysis-revision.pdf - comparison with original Compass analysis (GDELT→Perplexity, SearchAPI→agent-browser, sanctions.io→OpenSanctions)
05-copilot-comparison.pdf - comparison with Microsoft Copilot (Copilot CAN do PEP via Bing, but we have OpenSanctions integration)
ČEB = Česká exportní banka (client company, not software name)
Use 'naše řešení' instead of 'CEB' when referring to the software
Real metrics: 8 min without Sonar, 10 min with Sonar, 59-60 sources per entity
